project_descr: Sustainable Microfinance to Improve the Livelihoods of the Poor.

outputs.output_descr: The poor and vunerable households have increased income and improvement in living conditions by having sustainable access to institutional and community group manged financial services at affordable rates and appropriate terms and coinditions.

USAID funds to provide support to strengthen civil society by establishing community microfinance institutions which allow local decision-making, increase community participation in the issue that aftect their lives, and empower people to address independently househod and community needs.  The total project 00072865 project contribution is US$900,000.
donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)

document_name: 00051335_UNDP Myanmar Proposal  Sustainable Microfinance to Improve the Livelihoods of the Poor
